General.Name: DBAPPSecurity Co Ltd
General.Description: DBAPPSecurity Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of cybersecurity products in China. The company offers security products, including APT Discovery platform, Operation and Maintenance Audit and Risk Control System, Comprehensive Log Auditor, Database Auditor, Web Vulnerability Scanner, and Cloud and Big Data Security platforms, as well as SaaS cloud security services. It also provides professional security services, including application security, big data security, cloud security, IoT security, ICS security, industrial Internet security, etc. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

5.Name: Ms. Jing  Lou
5.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
